title: Rework Yasuo
body:
I literally don't even care about his win rate. I don't even care that I win 50% of my games against him. Even when I win its NOT FUN. Hi whole kit is cancer. His passive is the most overloaded pile of shit I've ever seen in my life. 2x CRITS??? A SHIELD???. OH and 2 knockups???? one on a dash the other on a long range tornado. A wind wall that blocks anything it touches from any direction. His 30 second ult. His 1 million dashes.
He buys literally a fucking Zeal and does assloads of damage, its disgusting.

But people make their excuses: 
"Avoid lanes with minions hurdurr" You mean lets win the game in Jungle?  Not with towers and the nexus? You mean avoid 1/3 of the map?? Skarner gets 4 spires where he's strong but a champion that's strong around lanes and minions is balanced??
"Use CC" This applies to any champ in the game, literally no clue why people say this shit
"Get good and get out of your lower elo" I don't have 40 hours a day to play this game like you neckbearded nerds.
"Just get him behind, he's useless behind" And watch him stay behind for a whopping 5 minutes until he reaches his late game 2 item powerspike and punish even the slightest bit of team mis-coordination.

Yeah but I guess the fact that he's banned almost every single game in lower elos doesn't speak to how displeased the community is with playing with this fuck. Low elo is >50% of the player base.

If any champ needs a rework it's this shit.

replies.body:
He needs a rework badly, but it will inevitably need to make him stronger in exchange for reliability.

His issue now is he has zero window-of-opportunity/outplay potential (he 'outplays' by pressing a button, zero skill, zero timing, totally based on matchup). He is either always oppressive or always useless.
hey don't even try to say more on this post, when you have a champion in your name and you try and defend them in a said champion hate post you gonna get lynched by boards trust me
yeah ive seen how that goes with zed posts LOL
